price: 23. Nous avons envoyé Moïse, muni de Nos Signes et d’un évident argument d’autorité,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
